title: 'Rare moment': Harvard University apologises over ‘insensitive image’ for Sanskrit course
summary_full: Harvard's South Asian Studies Department apologized for an insensitive social media post featuring artwork for its Sanskrit program. The Coalition of Hindus of North America had accused the university of Hinduphobia. The department expressed regret, committed to teaching Sanskrit, and is reviewing its social media processes to ensure alignment with its values.
